public ref class CodeDomLocalizationProvider sealed : IDisposable, System::ComponentModel::Design::Serialization::IDesignerSerializationProvider
type CodeDomLocalizationProvider = class interface IDisposable interface IDesignerSerializationProvider

summary.span: 提供 CodeDOM 资源序列化服务。

span.span: Provides CodeDOM resource serialization services.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是提供本地化功能的序列化提供程序。The class is a serialization provider that provides a localization feature. 它支持通过序列化到资源 ，并将两个属性添加到根组件： `Language` 和 `Localizable` 。It supports serializing to resources through , and it adds two properties to the root component: `Language` and `Localizable`. 如果 `Localizable` 设置为 `true` ，则该提供程序将更改生成组件属性的方式，并将其值路由到资源文件。If `Localizable` is set to `true`, this provider changes the way that component properties are generated and routes their values to a resource file. 支持两种本地化模型。Two localization models are supported. 您可以控制提供的区域性以及包含构造函数参数的本地化样式。You can control the cultures that are offered and the style of localization with constructor parameters.

related.span: 动态源代码生成和编译

span.span: Dynamic Source Code Generation and Compilation

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数创建新的适配器，并将其附加到序列化管理器。The constructor creates a new adapter and attaches it to the serialization manager. 这会将自身作为资源的序列化程序添加到序列化管理器中，如果尚未添加，则会将自身作为扩展程序提供程序添加到根组件。This adds itself as a serializer for resources into the serialization manager, and, if not already added, adds itself as an extender provider to the root component. 如果 `model` 参数不为 ，则将 提供 `Language` 和 `Localizable` 属性。If the `model` parameter is not , the provides the `Language` and `Localizable` properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数创建新的适配器，并将其附加到序列化管理器。The constructor creates a new adapter and attaches it to the serialization manager. 这会将自身作为资源的序列化程序添加到序列化管理器中，如果尚未添加，则会将自身作为扩展程序提供程序添加到根组件。This adds itself as a serializer for resources into the serialization manager, and, if not already added, adds itself as an extender provider to the root component. 如果 `model` 参数不为 ，则将 提供 `Language` 和 `Localizable` 属性。If the `model` parameter is not , the provides the `Language` and `Localizable` properties. 如果 `supportedCultures` 未提供，则默认值为计算机上当前安装的所有区域性。If `supportedCultures` is not provided, the default is all cultures that are currently installed on the computer. 如果提供了区域性数组，并且该数组包含计算机上未安装的区域性，则这些区域性不可用。If an array of cultures is provided, and it includes cultures that are not installed on the computer, those cultures are not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
